text: Bernard "Ben" Staartjes (9 December 1928 - 18 March 2014) was a Dutch sailor. He represented his country at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Kiel, Germany. In 1980, Staartjes was Chef de Equipe of the Dutch Olympic Sailing Team at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Tallinn. He was born in Amsterdam. Staartjes was born in Amsterdam. He died in Kapellen, Belgium, aged 85. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:Dutch sailors
title: Ben Staartjes
